696290.name: Sole Demo
696290.description:
Uncover the secrets of a world lost in shadow . . .


SOLE is a surreal adventure game where you play as the only source of light in a world shrouded in darkness. Wander through uninhabited environments, painting the land with light as you uncover its mysterious past. Explore the remnants of great cities and discover the history of an ancient civilization on your journey to restore life to an abandoned world.
696290.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
